intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Basudev Ghadai is a Python Developer based in Odisha, with a passion for backend development, automation, and AI. He specializes in building scalable applications and optimizing software performance.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Selene is a Jakarta-based design engineer with a passion for transforming complex challenges into simple, elegant design solutions. Her work spans digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and the convergence of design and technology.

Sapat International Pvt Ltd.achievements: Developed and maintained web applications using Python and Flask. Customized and extended Odoo ERP modules. Worked with OpenedX to enhance LMS features.

Central Parking Services.achievements: Automated tasks using Selenium in a Linux environment and managed parking software configurations at Jio World Centre.

Confluex Marketing Pvt Ltd.achievements: Wrote scalable code and integrated user-facing elements with back-end components to improve performance.

IBM.achievements: Developed and deployed a self-driving car lane detection model using OpenCV, Streamlit, and AWS.

FLY.achievements: Redesigned the UI/UX for the FLY platform, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement and 30% faster load times.;Spearheaded the integration of AI tools into design workflows, enabling designers to iterate 50% faster.

Creativ3.achievements: Developed a design system that unified the brand across multiple platforms, improving design consistency by 40%.;Led a cross-functional team to launch a new product line, contributing to a 15% increase in overall company revenue.

IGNOU.description: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA), Expected Graduation: 2025

National Skills Training Institute, Bhub.description: Advanced Diploma in IT, Graduated with 86% in 2022 (AIR Rank 24)

Build the Future.description: Studied online marketing and personal branding.

Python.description: Experienced in backend development, performance optimization, and API integrations using Python.

Flask.description: Skilled in building web applications using Flask.

OpenCV.description: Developed and deployed AI-based models using OpenCV.

Selenium.description: Used Selenium for automation in a Linux environment.

Odoo.description: Customized and extended Odoo ERP modules.

AWS.description: Utilized AWS services like Lambda, S3, EC2, SageMaker, and DynamoDB for cloud deployment and AI projects.

Streamlit.description: Built AI/ML applications using Streamlit for real-time interaction.

Figma.description: Able to prototype in Figma with Once UI with unnatural speed.

Nextjs.description: Building next gen apps with Next.js + Once UI + Supabase.
